<S%G3992><s%> But I Sent <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2745><s%> Our Boasting <S%G2257><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> About <S%G5228><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Should Be Made Void <S%G2758><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3313><s%> This Respect, <S%G5129><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> I Said, <S%G3004><s%> Prepared <S%G3903><s%> Ye May Be; <S%G5600><s%>
